actions.title: Address missing signal_strength_cache for open positions
actions.rationale: The 'Signal trend' section (3.4a) reports missing signal_strength_cache data. This is crucial for evaluating the health of open positions. Ensure the engine runs to generate this data.

actions.title: Generate correlation cache for risk assessment
actions.rationale: The 'Correlation concentration' section (3.4b) warns about a missing or empty correlation cache. This is vital for understanding concentration risk. Run the specified script to generate this cache.

actions.title: Review skip distribution for potential missed opportunities
actions.rationale: The 'Board actions' section (3.5) recommends reviewing skip distribution. Understanding why trades are skipped is key to unlocking potential edge. This review should inform adjustments to filtering or entry criteria.
